Darkfate::

"Those bot would like a good fight than heard speechs" said 
Darkfate"If they caught you aroun this time you couldn't come back to 
BlackFortress... "

"Have you tech skills? or can you do a bomb at least??" asked again 
Darkfate to Orchestra


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:


> ::Triggerhappy/Skullgrin/Orchestra::
> 
>         Triggerhappy stood outside Condor's cell.  He was beginning 
to get very bored.  He looked at Condor.
>    
>          "Hey buddy, I don't like this either, but apparently, I'md 
doing it for the good of my health.  So just do as your expected 
here," He warned.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>            Skullgrin arrived at the Decepticon base, tired from 
constantly switching back and forth from walking to driving in tank 
mode to walking and tank mode.  He went into the Decepticon base.  
Hopefully, he wouldn't be found as an enemy to anybody here.  He 
roamed the base, when he saw Triggerhappy.
> 
>           "Hey!  You!!  Triggerhappy!!  Nice to see you!  Haven't 
seen you for several hundred years!" He greeted.
> 
>             Triggerhappy laughed for a few seconds, then looked at 
Condor, then at Skullgrin.
> 
>             "What're you doing right now?" He asked.
> 
>             Skullgrin looked at Condor in the cell, then got a grin.
> 
>             "Well, how would you like it if I said I was relieving 
you of guard duty?" He asked.
> 
>              Triggerhappy grinned a grin of relief.
> 
>              "Would you?  Thanks, now I can do other stuff!" He 
said, walking away.
> 
>              Skullgrin went up to the cell, and sat down, but had 
his gun ready to fire at this Maximal.
> 
>               "You Maximals could really turn out to be pests.  
Listen, so-called Autobot descendant, when you're around me, you 
better fear me.  It is a sign of respect, but more importantly, it is 
perfectly logical.  I am one of the most evil Decepticons you'll ever 
meet, so you better sleep with one eye open!  That is, if you live 
long enough to get some sleep," He said, in a truely evil tone.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>          Orchestra nodded slowly.
> 
>          "Hmm, if we can disable this enemy's shields, I can sneak 
into their base and hopefully retrieve valuable propaganda," He 
said,"Sound like a plan?"
